sourceMeaningMnemonic: I hope all you're doing in the <radical>bathtub</radical> is taking a <kanji>bath</kanji>. I mean, you can do other things if you want I guess. But bathtubs were made just for baths!
meaningInfo: Picture yourself taking a bath in your bathtub. Relaxing!
readingMnemonic: When do you miss taking a <kanji>bath</kanji> the most? When you're on the <reading>ro</reading>ad (<ja>ろ</ja>). Traveling is fun and all, but when you're stuck in a car, traveling down a dirt road for days, all you want to do is take a nice long bath.
readingInfo: Imagine being stuck on the road all day for a week. Imagine how good a bath will feel when you finally get home. Nice and hot and relaxing. Mmmm...
